name: Ferryman's Farewell
description:
Description:

A short storydriven demo in which you play as Charon, ferryman of the dead. Your goal is to help the dead find and get to their final resting place in the underworld.

Controls:

Row: WASD

Camera: Mouse

Sailmode on/off: Space

Sailmode speed up/down: W/S

The demo is made for a resolution of 1920x1080.

A demo by: Prism Pond Games
